comment.author: 87724873@N00
comment._content: Donald Baxter MacMillan, 1874-1970 This photo was possibly taken right before he left for his 1913 Greenland exhibition, the first one that he led. How Stuff Works page - history.howstuffworks.com/polar-history/d-b-macmillan.htm From the thumbnail it looked a little like he was wearing a chicken suit.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: klynslis:  Thank you for your identification of the man in this photo as arctic explorer and scientist Donald Baxter MacMillan.  We will update our source data with his full name and reload the description.

comment._content: Wystan: Thanks - we'll be sure to fix the spelling when we update!
